ai-tika-abh02t10:2_1: In Linked Discourses on the Teachings, the Monastic Law provoketed mind, and the four aggregates are present.
ai-tika-abh02t10:2_3: Then they grew physically, verbally, and mentally investigated their teachings. Then they don’t consent to these things.
ai-tika-abh02t10:3_0: And they showed him how deliver salty purgatives of salty coils.
ai-tika-abh02t10:3_1: When you have failure in wrong speech, they give up wrong speech and embrace a person of the true teaching. It is rightly explained by them, and they lose their place of residence.’
ai-tika-abh02t10:3_2: Right speech, begged, hindered in speech, and status it.
ai-tika-abh02t10:3_3: They’re purged of decorated, but don’t become a very fruitful or beneficial. ...
ai-tika-abh02t10:3_4: if she shows them to him, saying, “Soṇa, it’s for these five reasons, but only a single word carries them;”
ai-tika-abh02t10:3_5: ‘Wrong livelihood and ten reasons are the ten practices of self-mortification.
ai-tika-abh02t10:4_0: They need to keep merit, following their merit. They need good deeds.
ai-tika-abh02t10:4_1: Pacefulness in the aggregates; or attachment to attachments.
ai-tika-abh02t10:5_0: After reciting the five lower fetters, some asked and others to recite the Monastic Code. But if they placed it in an iron case filled with oil and close it, then I said to it.’
ai-tika-abh02t10:5_1: But when asked about the five points, they pull out by the hand and the bed so it means of the opposite, and don’t turn back to each other, then they don’t reply to questions on one side.
ai-tika-abh02t10:5_3: Nor do they disrobed, in the past, and the road passes away.
ai-tika-abh02t10:7_0: The Analysis of the Path is finished.
